name: TOM Group
overview: TOM Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a media company in Mainland China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan and other Asian countries. The company operates in five segments: Internet, Publishing, Outdoor Media, Sports, and Television and Entertainment. The Internet segment offers wireless Internet services, online advertising, commercial enterprise solutions, and Internet access. The Publishing segment involves in magazine and book circulation, as well as in the sale of publication advertising and other related products. The Outdoor Media segment provides outdoor advertising services using billboards and unipoles. The Sports segment engages in event organization, advertising, and sponsorship sales in relation to sports events and programs. The Television and Entertainment segment operates a satellite television channel that offers Asian and International entertainment programming, as well as provides broadcasting post production services. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

acquisitions.source_description: TOM Group to buy out US-listed TOM Online
